cast.name: 亚历山大·多莫加罗夫 Aleksandr Domogarov

writer.name: 雅罗斯瓦夫·伊瓦什凯维奇 Jarosław Iwaszkiewicz

director.name: 安杰伊·瓦伊达 Andrzej Wajda

introduction: Noc czerwcowa is a single-act stage play turned into a TV film. It tells about the wife of a Polish nobleman banished to Syberia, who finds herself in front of a tough choice: either adhere to the ethical code and follow her husband into exile, or divorce him and stay put. Nobody actually wants her to go, besides she doesn’t love her husband very much, so she finally decides to stay, but after 20 years that decision doesn’t seems all that smart anymore…
